channel.title: Need help with other people joining my server
channel.description: I have everything set up with no-ip and followed all the steps. I even set the IP address in the client to be my ip, but I don't know how I can give it to my friends to get them to connect. I am trying on moparscape to connect to my server, but it won't do it. I even went to rswebclients website status checker and checked my server and it said it was online. Can I get some help please? :)

item.title: Need help with other people joining my server
item.dc:creator: @ragingdragon4 ragingdragon4
item.description:
@ragingdragon4 wrote:

Yes my port forward is set up correctly as well.

Read full topic
